original_text: God spoke to Abimelech again in a dream. He said, ‘That is true. You did not think that you were doing something wrong. I know that. So I did not let you touch her. I stopped you from doing anything wrong against me.
korean_text: 하나님이 꿈에 또 그에게 이르시되 네가 온전한 마음으로 이렇게 한 줄을 나도 알았으므로 너를 막아 내게 범죄하지 아니하게 하였나니 여인에게 가까이 하지 못하게 함이 이 때문이니라

sentences.original_text: God spoke to Abimelech again in a dream.
You did not think that you were doing something wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신이 잘못된 것을 하고 있다고 생각하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So I did not let you touch her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 당신이 그녀를 만지지 못하게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I stopped you from doing anything wrong against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신이 나에게 잘못하는 것을 막았습니다.
